name: M Kadima
description: For some, art is secondary; for others, it is vital. It's impossible to think about life, to be in life, to be alive without being connected to art. Meschack Moyengo Kadima is one of those souls for whom the question of engaging with art never even arose. Destiny proved stronger than man. A self-taught and multidisciplinary artist, it is through painting that his path stands out—or rather, through the art of being himself.

name: Fally Ipupa
description: Fally Ipupa, born on December 14, 1977 in Kinshasa, DR Congo, is a Congolese singer-songwriter, dancer, and producer. He is also a UNICEF ambassador. Starting out singing in various small street groups, he was noticed by Koffi Olomidé who brought him into his group Quartier Latin, where he stayed for 7 years and participated in 6 albums. In 2006, he signed with Obouo Music and released his first solo album *Droit Chemin*.
